name: Apple iPhone 15 (128 GB)
reviewText: Based on 6,966 customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Apple iPhone 15 (128 GB) features a sleek design, powerful A17 Bionic chip, advanced camera system, and vibrant display. It delivers smooth performance, excellent photography, and a premium user experience, making it one of the most desirable smartphones of the year.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G AI Smartphone
reviewText: Based on 8,567 customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G offers a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a professional-grade 200MP camera system. Designed for photography enthusiasts and multitaskers, it combines elegant design, advanced AI features, and ultra-fast 5G performance.

name: Orient Electric 1200 mm Zeno BLDC | BLDC Energy Saving Ceiling Fan with Remote
reviewText: Based on 7,000 customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Orient Electric 1200 mm Zeno BLDC ceiling fan is an energy-efficient fan equipped with a BLDC motor and remote control. It offers superior airflow, quiet operation, and modern design, making it an excellent choice for cooling your living spaces while saving on electricity bills.

name: Redmi A4 5G (Starry Black, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage) | 6.88in 120Hz | 50MP Dual Camera | 18W Fast Charging | Charger in Box
reviewText: Based on 100,000+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: Redmi A4 5G is a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a large 6.88-inch 120Hz display, 4GB RAM, and 64GB storage. It boasts a 50MP dual camera setup, 18W fast charging, and comes with a charger in the box, making it an excellent choice for everyday use.

name: OnePlus Nord CE4 (Celadon Marble, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | Lifetime Display Warranty
reviewText: Based on 15,000+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The OnePlus Nord CE4 combines flagship-level performance with sleek design and practical features. Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor, it offers smooth multitasking and gaming. The 6.7-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate delivers vibrant visuals, while the 5500mAh battery ensures all-day power with 100W SUPERVOOC fast charging. Its dual rear cameras (50MP Sony IMX882 sensor + 8MP ultra-wide) capture stunning shots, and OxygenOS provides a clean, fast Android experience. The Nord CE4 also comes with a lifetime display warranty, making it one of the best value-for-money smartphones in its segment.

name: DIY Quadcopter Drone Kit with Remote Controller, Motors, Flight Controller, Battery and Propellers
reviewText: Based on 15,000+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: Build and fly your own DIY Quadcopter Drone with this complete kit. Includes remote controller, motors, flight controller, battery, and propellers. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use, perfect for hobbyists and drone enthusiasts to learn and enjoy flying.

name: Samsung 138 cm (55 inches) Vision AI 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV QA55QEF1AULXL
reviewText: Based on 12,000+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: Experience stunning visuals with the Samsung 138 cm (55 inches) Vision AI 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV. Featuring Quantum Dot technology for vibrant colors, AI-powered upscaling, and a sleek design, this TV offers an immersive viewing experience. Enjoy smart features, voice control, and access to popular streaming apps for endless entertainment.

name: Sleepynuts Men's Regular Fit Round Neck Half Sleeves Solid Casual Wear T-Shirt
reviewText: Based on 1,000+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: Sleepynuts Men's Regular Fit Round Neck Half Sleeves Solid Casual Wear T-Shirt is made from high-quality fabric, offering comfort and style for everyday wear. Perfect for casual outings, this t-shirt combines durability with a trendy look.

colors.name: Periwinkle, Light Pink, Winslow, Sky Blue
Army, Mint Green, Sky Blue, Navy Milli

name: Noise Advanced Bluetooth Smartwatch
reviewText: Based on 50K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Noise Advanced Bluetooth Smartwatch comes with a sleek design and powerful features to keep you connected and healthy. It supports Bluetooth calling, offers a bright display for clear visibility, and includes multiple health tracking modes. Designed for daily use, fitness, and style.
features: Bluetooth calling with built-in speaker and mic
Smart notifications for calls and apps

name: iQOO Neo 10R 5G (Moonknight Titanium, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
reviewText: Based on 100K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: Experience next-level performance with the iQOO Neo 10R 5G powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor. It delivers segment’s most stable 90FPS gaming for up to 5 hours and features India’s slimmest 6400mAh battery. The 120Hz AMOLED display ensures ultra-smooth visuals, while the 8GB RAM and 256GB storage allow effortless multitasking. With a premium Moonknight Titanium design, this device offers a perfect blend of power, style, and durability.
features: Most stable 90FPS gaming for up to 5 hours
Premium Moonknight Titanium and Raging Blue finishes

customerReviews.comment: An absolute powerhouse! The gaming performance is super smooth, and battery life is excellent. Definitely one of the best phones under ₹35,000.
Sleek design with flagship-level performance. The display quality and charging speed are impressive!
Camera performance could be slightly better, but overall, the performance and battery are top-notch.

name: pTron KWM-1 Omnidirectional Type C Wireless Microphone (Black)
reviewText: Based on 15K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The pTron KWM-1 is a compact omnidirectional wireless microphone designed for content creators, vloggers, and online educators. Featuring DSP noise cancellation and a 25m wireless range, it ensures clear and stable audio recording. With plug-and-play functionality and Type-C support, it works seamlessly with Android smartphones and compatible iPhones, making it ideal for video recording, interviews, and live streaming.

customerReviews.comment: Great microphone for the price. Audio quality is clear and works perfectly for Instagram reels and YouTube shorts.
Easy to use and lightweight. Noise cancellation works well indoors.
Good battery and stable connection. Range is decent for outdoor shoots.

name: Shining Diva Fashion Latest Stylish Choker Traditional Pearl Kundan Necklace Jewellery Set for Women
reviewText: Based on 25K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Shining Diva Fashion Traditional Pearl Kundan Choker Necklace Set is a perfect blend of elegance and ethnic charm. Designed with premium-quality pearls and kundan stones, this jewellery set enhances your traditional outfits and is ideal for weddings, festivals, and special occasions.
features: Premium quality alloy with gold polish

customerReviews.comment: Beautiful necklace set! Looks exactly like the pictures and goes perfectly with my saree.
Very elegant and lightweight. Great quality for the price.
Perfect for weddings and festive wear. Pearls look premium.

name: VELOMAX YouTube Wireless Noise Reduction Magnetic Clip Microphone (Dual Channel Type-C)
reviewText: Based on 8K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The VELOMAX Wireless Microphone is designed for YouTubers, vloggers, and content creators who need crystal-clear audio. It features advanced noise reduction, a magnetic clip for easy attachment, LED indicators, and a battery display. The dual-channel Type-C receiver allows seamless recording for interviews, podcasts, and video creation.
features: Ideal for YouTube, vlogging, interviews & reels

customerReviews.comment: Perfect mic for YouTube videos. Noise reduction works really well and setup is super easy.
Magnetic clip is very useful and audio quality is clear for indoor recordings.
Good battery backup and dual mic support makes interviews very smooth.
